title: How to: Script Inconspiciously

embed.description: Getting hit by 0 skillshots 20 minutes into the game is legit skill trust me guys im smurf

body: I really hope reports are getting looked at.

replies.body: Why are people calling him Bronze when he's a better player than all of you?

No one called him bronze as far as I can see and you can't judge someone skill based on a game where they scripted. This guy lost trades to a Nidalee who didn't get a single hunt mark on him, that's impressively bad.

> [{quoted}](name=Norak,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VENy3Brf,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-04-21T02:20:04.692+0000)
>
> No one called him bronze as far as I can see and you can't judge someone skill based on a game where they scripted. This guy lost trades to a Nidalee who didn't get a single hunt mark on him, that's impressively bad.

People are calling you Bronze.
Oh.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Burrito AU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VENy3Brf,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-04-21T02:09:22.615+0000)
>
> Why are people calling him Bronze when he's a better player than all of you?

+1
I can't tell if troll or not.....

I can't tell cause I'm bronze!
How do you know for sure? What comfirms it?

A friend of mine asked me the same thing, I'll copy paste what I wrote to him:

there's 3 things that give them away
1. They change directions too fast for humans to move their mouse (i.e. 7 seconds in)
2. They change direction/move a direction and at the same time cast an ability somewhere else (mouse can't be in two places at once, i.e. also 7 seconds in)
and 
3. They dodge into walls to dodge skillshots, which is kinda in the last clip with leona E, but usually they're even more clutch than that
Damn that is some serious scripting...should receive a ban. Can't be more obvious he is scripting.

lol...................

im plat 2 and it seems basic dodging to me, most the spears were long range and a lot of time to dodge. git gud
Then explain 7 seconds in when he moves right, and left extremely quickly, whilst he lasers above himself? His mouse can't be in 3 places at the same time Mr. Plat 2 God.

go watch lastshadow guides :^) closer the mouse to your champion more movements can be played in smaller periods of time. the mouse wasnt in 3 diff spots at the **SAME** time it was moved quickly within .5 of a second. Which again isnt hard to do, aswell as smartcasting viktor E. goml

Funny how you bring up your elo as if that's proof as you being good at the game and correct. Plat 2 is not a good elo mate, and being plat 2 doesn't make you right so you should keep that to yourself.

What Viktor did was scripting, not moving his mouse really quickly. Watch the video again. I've slowed it down to 0.25x its speed, he's not moving his mouse to 3 different spots within 0.5 of a second, he's moving his mouse to 4 different spots in 0.25 of a second. 

Even your claim of him moving it 3 times in 0.5 seconds is impossible, a fighter pilots reaction time is one of the greatest in the world and using their reaction time 0.4 s out of the 0.5 s you claim this viktor did this in would be purely reacting to things he sees on the screen.

Now get off your "plat 2 Lastshadow watching" high horse. You're not nearly as good as you think.

> Even your claim of him moving it 3 times in 0.5 seconds is impossible, a fighter pilots reaction time is one of the greatest in the world and using their reaction time 0.4 s out of the 0.5 s you claim this viktor did this in would be purely reacting to things he sees on the screen.

You don't have to be reacting to a nidalee spear that hasn't been thrown yet to try and dodge it friend :^)
Ok at this point you're either a troll or just really dumb, not gonna bother arguing with either.
well looking at your video you obviously dont play nidalee often to be in aa range of a viktor in the firstplace. lel git rekt
i could mimic this play on 200 ping.
i can do tat and i am only silver 5 so this guy iz trash
Can't tell if troll.
7 Seconds in is not luck, it's using abilities in completely different directions to where you are moving your character, at the same moment.
That's not scripting he's just really good at dodging.

No, it's so obvious. Look at 7 seconds in, I even zoomed in and put it in slow-mo for you. He clicks right, left, right, up faster than a human possibly can, whilst also using laser. His mouse can't be in 3 places at the same time.
I know, I was just kidding.

Uh, yeah, so was I.

B-Baka
Maybe that nidalee is just awful

Someone that holds held high diamond for 2 seasons in a row is awful compared to high challenger players. Not to random golds. Even then I beat high challenger players on Nidalee.

Nice try though, don't know why you'd stand up for a scripter.
0:27 makes it obvious
Except 0:27 is still not one that proves scripting as it's human nature of predicting an obvious spear.
For me it was 0:27 and also 0:07 (he lasers in a completely different spot than he's moving to).
The only one that actually looks like scripting is the leona dodge at the end, most of this just shows that dodging nid spears is easy, and minion block is annoying as fuck.

I do not know if he was scripting or not but regarding the movement, you do not need to right-click several times to move. If you hold down right-click, your champion will follow the cursor so what he did at 7 seconds was not impossible for a human.

You're missing the point of what I said about 7 seconds. Look where he's moving, how fast he's moving and then look at his E. He uses his E in a completely different direction to where he's moving, at the exact same time. It's not possible.

Its possible to move while an ability is being used. He obviously clicked, saw he was walking into the spear then clicked to walk away while shooting the lazer, i don't see how thats scripting, you obviously don't know or can even see how obvious it was that nidalee was going to throw that spear.

You obviously don't know or can't even see how obvious it was that he was scripting. He moved in the exact same frame he used his laser. That is not possible as you cannot have your mouse in 2 places on the screen at the same time. 

Do not argue so confidently about things you so obviously don't understand.

Idk, most of those spears were horrible, and the ones that weren't, might've been lucky.

It depends on the ELO, if he was plat +, I'd think was skill, but who knows.
Some of it was extremely obvious. some parts weren't though.
The extra ones were there to take the point home, literally every single skillshot in his direction missed for 20 minutes. I tried to make the unimportant misses short clips.
